import { useState } from "react" const Form = () => { const initialValues = { 'current-savings' : '10000', 'yearly-contribution' : '111', 'expected-return' : '7', duration : 2 } const [userInput, setUserInput] = useState(initialValues); const handleFormSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const formData = new FormData(event.target); console.log(Object.fromEntries(formData)) } return (

) } export default Form;
